name: OR_LOG_ADTL_RES
description: The OR_LOG_ADTL_RES table contains OR management system log additional resource requests.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log for which there are additional resources.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the additional resource.

columns.name: ADTL_RES
columns.description: The free text request for additional equipment, instruments, implants, or supplies.
